description: Main entry point and core UI setup for the Flutter notes organizing app. It includes app initialization, theme management, home screen layout, drawer navigation, search functionality, and import statements for models, providers, and widgets.

classes.name: NotesApp
classes.description: Root widget that manages theme mode and initializes provider setup.

classes.name: _NotesAppState
classes.description: State class for NotesApp handling theme persistence and configuration.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Main screen displaying list of notes, search and filter options.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State for HomeScreen managing filtering, search, and note editing.

classes.name: NavigationDrawer
classes.description: Drawer widget for navigation and theme toggle.

classes.name: NotesSearchDelegate
classes.description: Custom search delegate for searching notes.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, initializes environment and runs the app.

methods.name: _loadThemePref
methods.description: Loads theme preference from shared preferences.

methods.name: _toggleTheme
methods.description: Toggles the theme mode and updates preferences.

methods.name: _setActiveTag
methods.description: Sets the currently active filter tag.

methods.name: _openNoteEditor
methods.description: Opens note editor modal for creating or editing a note.
